hold-confirmation.title: Geração de Etiquetas
hold-confirmation.message: Confirma a geração da etiqueta de envio? É necessário que seja confirmado no checkout do Melhorenvio e efetuado o pagamento da mesma.

OrderDeliveryEmailNotification.description: This notification sends by email to client when all shipments has been delivered

Checkout.title: Checkou Automático (necessário saldo em crédito na conta do melhorenvio)

EnableSyncJob.title: Enable Sync Job for Tracking shippements

CronSyncJob.title: Cron expression for processing job execution
CronSyncJob.description:
The value is a regular CRON expression.
To run task every X minutes please use "0/x * * * *".
To run it every X hours at 00 minutes use "0 */X * * *". You can also specify minutes: "15 */x * * *"
To run it every X days at midnight use "0 0 */x * *"

AgencyAzul.title: Id da Agencia de envio utilizada da azul Express
AgencyAzul.description: consultar api https://www.melhorenvio.com.br/api/v2/me/shipment/agencies, exemplo: curl -k --location -g --request GET 'https://www.melhorenvio.com.br/api/v2/me/shipment/agencies?company=9&country=BR&state=PB&city=Campina Grande' | json_pp | more

AgencyJadLog.title: Id da Agencia de envio utilizada da Jadlog
AgencyJadLog.description: consultar api https://www.melhorenvio.com.br/api/v2/me/shipment/agencies, exemplo: curl -k --location -g --request GET 'https://www.melhorenvio.com.br/api/v2/me/shipment/agencies?company=2&country=BR&state=PB&city=Campina Grande' | json_pp | more
